title: How to start a successful beauty and fashion blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowadays, there is a rise in people who are uploading beauty and fashion related content like blogs and vlogs over the internet and there is a large viewership for such content and people enjoy it thoroughly. I would suggest you first watch some content which is already available over the internet learn basics and also see what they are missing which you can catch and include in your video. Well, there is a website called Trell where you get paid for creating content and there are so many categories for which content can be created and shared with people across the nation.
It’s a great idea, for this you need to post latest beauty tips and trendy fashion styles regularly in your blog.
